Description:
Imagine if every researcher could collaborate with a tireless team of intelligent, synergistic AI agents with the sole purpose of accelerated innovation. This is the vision of Microsoft Discovery, bringing agentic R&D to life by leveraging the latest innovations from Microsoft and the broader scientific ecosystem. Discovery implements a continuous and iterative R&D cycle where researchers can orchestrate a team of specialized AI agents not just for reasoning, but for conducting research itself.

Title: Accelerating R&D and scientific breakthroughs with Microsoft Discovery | BRK182
